name: Citidecor
overview:
Citidecor. began in 2006 and has grown rapidly over the past 4 years in selling product in the U.S. for the home and office

Our company has provided huge savings to our U.S. customers; Citidecor.com has opened its doors to online shoppers from Canada, the U.K., and Germany. Citidecor offers a selection of items for most home and office goods. These items are priced right to be extremely competitive with other stores, providing our customers with strong savings, too. This combination of benefits is rare among online retailers and is what sets us far apart.

Our product categories cover everything from cookware, ultra modern furniture, bunk bed-office combinations, chairs, grills, greenhouses and much more. If it’s a piece of furniture or an appliance that you need for your home or office, you should check for it at Citidecor (www.citidecor.com) first, as there’s a good chance we carry it and at a ultra competitive price. Our Vision: To become a quality brand name Our Mission: To build a lasting organization that succeeds and grows which obtains the affordable product, at the highest quality so our customers can also succeed in the buying process.
